title: Fireside with the Underboss - "I said, There's No Way I Will Agree To That In Court"
description: During his time in Quantico, Sammy builds unique relationships with all of the agents. In this story he tells more about those relationships as they grew over time.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: During his time in Quantico, Sammy builds unique relationships with all of the agents. In this story he tells more about those relationships as they grew over time.
